dmca.title: DMCA notice to Theplanet.com
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Dr N K Mohindra [mailto:info@dentalfacelift.com] 
Posted At: Thursday, November 09, 2006 8:35 AM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: 
Subject: RE: 



Dear sir,

 

I am writing to complain about a website which infringes my copyright.
The copyrighted work infringed can be found on: 
www.dentalfacelift.com/why_dfl.htm

 

The material infringing my copyright can be found on 
www.drfrazar.com/pages/facelift.htm

 

I am Dr. Naresh (Nick) Mohindra, principal of Added Dimension Dentistry,
18 Wimpole Street, London W1G8GD tel. 020 7636 9978 email: 
info@dentalfacelift.com

 

The material used by Dr. Frazar on her website is not authorized by me
or anyone acting on my behalf.

 

I Dr N.K. Mohindra own the copyright to the contents of my website 
www.dentalfacelift.com <http://www.dentalfacelift.com/>  and all
photographs. The ADD Dentalfacelift is a registered trademark owned by
me.

I Dr. N. K. Mohindra ( the complaining party) have a good faith belief
that the use of the material in the manner complained of is not
authorized by the copyright owner, its agent or the law, and

The information in this notification is accurate and under penalty of
perjury I ( the complaining party) am authorized to act on behalf of the
owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed,

 

Dr. N. K. Mohindra

Added Dimension Dentistry

 

________________________________

From: Copyright [mailto:Copyright@theplanet.com] 
Sent: 07 November 2006 19:08
To: Dr N K Mohindra
Subject: RE: 

 

Please visit www.theplanet.com/index.html?p=copyright

specifically 

" 

*  A statement that the Complaining Party has a good faith belief that
use of the material in the manner complained of is not authorized by the
copyright owner, its agent, or the law; and 

*  A statement that the information in the notification is accurate, and
under penalty of perjury, that the Complaining Party is authorized to
act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly
infringed. " 

Thank you,

 

Legal Response Team

 

________________________________

From: Dr N K Mohindra [mailto:info@dentalfacelift.com] 
Posted At: Monday, November 06, 2006 9:54 AM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: 
Subject: RE: 

Dear Sir,

I believe I followed your protocol on your website although I omitted to
name the designated agent: Andrea Ammeida, Associate General Counsel,
1333 Stemmons Freeway, Suite 110, DallasTX75207. 

If you are unable to advise me further, should I be instructing my
lawyer to proceed with this Notification of Claimed Infringement?

Yours Sincerely,

Dr. N. K. Mohindra

 

________________________________

From: Copyright [mailto:Copyright@theplanet.com] 
Sent: 06 November 2006 15:12
To: Dr N K Mohindra
Cc: Theplanet@chillingeffects.org
Subject: FW: 

 

To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

 

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/index.html?p=copyright.

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

 

________________________________

From: Dr N K Mohindra [mailto:info@dentalfacelift.com] 
Posted At: Monday, November 06, 2006 6:59 AM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: 
Subject: 

Dear Sir,

www.dentalfacelift.com/why_dfl.htm

I am Dr. Naresh (Nick) Mohindra , principal of Added Dimension

info@dentalfacelift.com

 

The material used by Dr. Frazar on her website is not authorized  by me
or anyone acting on my behalf.

 

I Dr N.K. Mohindra own the copyright to the contents of my website 
www.dentalfacelift.com <http://www.dentalfacelift.com/>  and all
photographs. The ADD Dentalfacelift is a registered trademark owned by
me.

 

Please do not hesitate to contact me if there is anything further you
require from me,

 

Yours Sincerely,

 

 



 

Dr. N. K. Mohindra
